arts.ttl: Neil Critchley hopes for Hearts takeoff at last as boss sets sights on sinking Aberdeen
arts.sum: It was a much-needed win for the Jambos on the road at Tannadice

arts.ttl: Jim Goodwin rues big Dundee Utd decision that backfired as Hearts leave boss wondering what could have been
arts.sum: The United boss was desperate for victory but the Jambos quickly ruined his plans with James Penrice's winner

arts.sum: The Jambos are currently in talks over a move for the Australian international

arts.ttl: Hearts revival continues with win over in-form Dundee United
arts.sum: Full-back James Penrice blasted home a 73rd-minute winner.

Both Dundee United and Heart of Midlothian kicked off 2025 with victories in the Scottish Premiership, as the team in third place take on last season's 'best of the rest' at Tannadice. Dundee United ...

arts.ttl: Watch the goals as Dundee Utd strike late to win derby
arts.sum: Watch the best of the action as Dundee United score late on to come from behind to win the derby.

arts.ttl: Craig Gordon on his career 'bonus stage' as he opens up on Hearts contract talks
arts.sum: The Jambos keeper stood tall against Motherwell with big saves as he admits 'I didn't envisage playing to this age'

arts.ttl: Sam Dalby makes stance on Dundee United transfer clear amid Wrexham question mark
arts.sum: The derby goal hero would love to stick around for the rest of the season with Jim Goodwin's side

arts.ttl: Hearts sign Rotherham's McCart on permanent deal
arts.sum: Heart of Midlothian sign defender Jamie McCart from Rotherham United for an undisclosed fee on a deal until 2029.

arts.ttl: Charlie Mulgrew lined up for first manager job as Celtic hero prepares for Kelty Hearts talks
arts.sum: The League One side are set to lose their current boss Michael Tidser to Dunfermline
